special_powers.name: THROW ACROSS THE SCREEN
special_powers.description: When Leonardo hits an adjacent character, after resolutions you may place that character into a square adjacent to Leonardo, then use Force Blast targeting that character at no cost.

special_powers.name: TEMPORARY SHREDDER ILLUSION
special_powers.description: For all characters that can use this trait, whenever a friendly character within 6 squares named Shredder would take damage, you may reduce that damage by 1 in addition to any other effects that reduce damage. If you do, after resolutions, deal 1 unavoidable damage to a friendly character named Shredder Illusion.

special_powers.name: REDUCED TO RUBBLE
special_powers.description: When Rock Soldier is KO'd, after resolutions generate a standard heavy object in it's square.

special_powers.name: SWARM AT THE SCREEN'S EDGE
special_powers.description: When Foot Soldier would be KO'd, roll a d6 and add the number of other friendly characters KO'd this turn. If the total is 5 or more, instead turn this character to click #1 and place it in your starting area.

special_powers.name: ROCKOLIZER RAY
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire, if that character is adjacent to a piece of blocking terrain, make a close attack targeting it regardless of adjacency, modifying attack and damage +1

special_powers.description: The first time each game Bebop would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #7, then heal him 1 click if an opposing force has 1 or 2 characters on it; otherwise, heal him 2 clicks. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: STOP GETTING IN DA WAY!
special_powers.description: Once per turn when a friendly character within 3 squares named Rocksteady hits with an attack that's part of a costed action, after resolutions Bebop may make an attack. If he does and misses, deal that Rocksteady 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: TIME FOR THE PIRATE WHIP
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Bebop uses it, after resolutions hit characters are dealt 1 penetrating damage and can't move or make attacks during their next turn.

special_powers.name: ILLUSIONARY DOUBLE
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character named Shredder Illusion is on your force, generate a TMNTUP #005 Shredder Illusion. Your opponents don't score that character

special_powers.description: The first two times each game Shredder would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #6, then heal him 1 click if an opposing force has 1 or 2 characters on it; otherwise, heal him 2 clicks. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: RETROMUTAGEN RAY
special_powers.description: Outwit. When Shredder uses it, the targeted character can use Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn.

special_powers.name: FOLLOW ME, TURTLES
special_powers.description: Whenever a friendly character with the TMNT keyword uses Sidestep, it may move up to 3 squares instead of 2.

special_powers.name: PIZZA REWARD
special_powers.description: When an adjacent friendly characters hits one or more opposing characters, after resolutions heal that friendly character 1 click.

special_powers.name: REBUILD THE FOOT CLAN IN THE OLD WAYS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When building your force, friendly characters 75 points or less with the Martial Artist keyword also have the Foot Clan keyword.

special_powers.name: TEACHINGS OF THE ASHI NO HIMITSU
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth. When Karai uses Sidestep, if no opposing character has line of fire to her when giving the action, she can move up to 4 squares instead of 2.

special_powers.name: LEVEL BOSS: FLASHING ORANGE
special_powers.description: The first time each game Baxter Stockman would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #6, then heal him 1 click if an opposing force has 1 or 2 characters on it; otherwise, heal him 2 clicks. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: "STICKY FINGERS" RAY
special_powers.description: Telekinesis. When Baxter Stockman uses it, modify his attack +2.

special_powers.name: HOLE TO THE RAT LAIR
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, place a Hole marker in any square at least 5 squares away from a starting area. At the beginning of your turn, if no character occupies the square with the Hole marker and less then 3 Giant Rat bystanders are on the map, generate a Giant Rat bystander in a square adjacent to the Hole.

special_powers.name: I CONTROL ALL THE RATS IN THE WORLD
special_powers.description: Sidestep. When Ha'antaan the Rat King moves at least 1 square and ends adjacent to an opposing character, after resolutions all friendly bystanders named Giant Rat may move 1 square.

special_powers.name: MY CHILDREN ARE LEGION
special_powers.description: Exploit Weakness, Leadership.

special_powers.name: SWARM OF RATS
special_powers.description: If Giant Rat is adjacent to one or more friendly bystanders named Giant Rat, modify its damage +1, if it's adjacent to two or more of them, also modify its attack +1.

special_powers.name: TALES OF THE TMNT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters taht can use this trait, choose a "Tale:" trait that a friendly character can use. This game, all friendly characters with a "Tale:" trait can use the chosen trait instead of any other "Tale:" trait.

special_powers.name: TALE: MAZES AND MUTANTS
special_powers.description: This character has PROTECTED: opposing Perplex, opposing Probability Control.

special_powers.name: TALE: REQUIEM
special_powers.description: Whenever another friendly character is KO'd by an opposing character, heal this character 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: LEAD MY BROTHERS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Leonardo uses it, on a result of 6 you may also remove an action token from another friendly character with the TMNT or TMNT Ally keyword. (Anywhere on the map)

special_powers.name: LEAVE MY FAMILY ALONE!
special_powers.description: Invulnerability. Adjacent friendly characters with the TMNT or TMNT Ally keyword modify defense +1.

special_powers.name: BOOYAKASHA
special_powers.description: When Michelangelo hits an opposing character with an attack, after resolutions choose one: Smoke Cloud at no cost -or- friendly characters modify attack +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: CURSED BLADES OF VENGEANCE
special_powers.description: When Alopex hits an opposing character, give them a Curse token. // Characters with one or more Curse tokens modify attack -1, and any attack made by those characters that misses all targets becomes a critical miss.

special_powers.name: CATCH A TIGER BY THE TAIL
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. Alopex modifies attack +1 when attacking the chosen character and modifies defense +1 when attacked by the chosen character.

special_powers.name: FASTER THAN THE EYE CAN FOLLOW
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry

special_powers.description: The first two times Krang would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #6, then heal him 1 click if an opposing force has 1 or 2 characters on it; otherwise, heal him 2 clicks. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: RUTHLESS ALIEN CONQUEROR
special_powers.description: When Krang KO's an opposing character, put a Conquest marker in a square they occupied. Opposing characters modify their attack and defense values -1 for each Conquest marker within 3 squares of them.

special_powers.name: RECOVERED THE TURNSTONE!
special_powers.description: Shape Change, but succeeds on a 4-6. Perplex, but modifies the combat value +2 or -2. Opposing characters can't use Perplex or Shape Change.

special_powers.name: JUMP KICK

special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. FREE: Move up to 2 squares. Only activate this if Leonard missed with a close attack this turn.
